SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Animal
Represents an animal in the Animal Network Book system.
AnimalService
The AnimalService class provides business logic for managing and interacting with animals in a shelter.
AnimalView
The AnimalView class implements Renderable and is responsible for rendering animal-related views and collecting user input.
AnimalView.AnimalMenu
Represents different menu options for animal-related operations.
AuthenticationAndRegistrationView
A view responsible for handling user authentication and registration.
AuthenticationView
A view responsible for handling user authentication.
AuthorizationService
Provides authentication services for user authorization.
DeserializationException
An exception class for handling deserialization-related errors.
EmailService
Provides functionality for sending verification code emails.
Entity
An abstract base class representing an entity in the Animal Network Book system.
EntityArgumentException
Exception thrown when an entity receives invalid arguments.
ExceptionTemplate
Enum representing templates for error messages in the application.
FileCheckerUtil
Utility class for checking and creating directories and files needed for the application.
GenerateReport
Generates Excel reports from a list of entities.
JsonConverter
Utility class for converting objects to and from JSON format.
JsonPaths
Enum representing paths to various JSON files used in the application.
Main
The main class for the Animal Network Book program.
MainMenuView
Represents the main menu view for the application.
MainMenuView.MainMenu
Enum representing the main menu options.
RegistrationService
Provides functionality for user registration and verification.
RegistrationView
Represents the registration view for user registration in the application.
Renderable
The Renderable interface represents an object that can be rendered, typically in a UI or display context.
Request
Represents a request in the Animal Network Book system.
Request.RequestStatus
Represents the status of a request.
RequestService
Provides functionality related to animal adoption requests.
RequestView
The RequestView class provides a user interface for managing requests related to animals.
SerializationException
An exception class for handling serialization-related errors.
Shelter
Represents a shelter in the Animal Network Book system.
ShelterService
Provides functionality related to animal shelters.
ShelterView
The `ShelterView` class provides user interface functionality related to shelters in an animal network book application.
SignUpException
Exception thrown when an error occurs during the sign-up process.
User
Represents a user in the Animal Network Book system.
User.Role
Represents the role of a user in the Animal Network Book system.
User.Role.EntityName
Represents the names of entities in the Animal Network Book system.
User.Role.Permission
Represents the permissions for a user role in the Animal Network Book system.
UserService
The UserService class provides methods for managing user data.
UserView
The UserView class represents the view for managing user-related operations.
ValidatorServiceUtil
Utility class providing common validation methods.
VerificationException
Exception thrown when an error occurs during the verification process.
